name: Nick Bounty: A Case of the Crabs
name_original: Nick Bounty: A Case of the Crabs
description:
Something stinks and it smells like crab. You play as Detective Nick Bounty, who despite his ability to solve the most tangled cases, has yet to work for a paying client. This time it’s up to you to discover who knocked off a local seafood salesman and get to the bottom of a diabolical counterfeiting operation

FEATURES

  • Classic Point & Click interface.
  • Stylish Black & White “film noir” graphics.
  • Fully vocalized by talented actors.
  • Flash based MAAGE engine.
